channel.title: Music on Massimiliano Canzi
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Massimiliano Canzi

item.title: Goldfish (LP) by Asami Yamazaki
item.description: Overview tags: lo-fi, ambient, post-rock, noise The first LP by the solo project Asami Yamazaki (Massimiliano Canzi) features tracks written between 2013 and 2015. The entire LP was written, played, recorded, mixed and mastered by Massimiliano Canzi with the exception of these tracks: Okinawa: Massimiliano Canzi: beats, synths, samples, recording, mixing, mastering. Marco Bergamaschi: samples, recording, mixing, mastering. Superstereo: Massimiliano Canzi: writing, beats, synths, bass, mixing, mastering. Mario Blaconà: guitars

item.title: Continental (EP) by Fukushima Sushi
item.description: Overview tags: post rock, instrumental rock, stoner, lo-fi, electronic Massimiliano Canzi: guitar, vocals (in ‘Nothing’) and production Mario Blaconà: guitar, vocals Giorgio Mussi: bass Jacopo Invernizzi: drums Tracklist Concrete DUI Post-colonian rock Nothing

item.title: Clouds in a Bundle (EP) by mymindasacircuit
item.description: Overview tags: chillout, ambient, instrumental, loops Massimiliano Canzi: guitars, bass, production, keyboard Roland Erulo: guitars, production, keyboard, drums Tracklist Intro Rain Afternoon Choices Immersion Soundtrack of a movie never made Absent Sun
